sys_ux_client_script.name: My task page redirection

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_43125650a9670210d5c2f95166e0f21a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing Page">83125650c5670210243595fa0781f628</macroponent><name>My task page redirection</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    const {
        state,
        emit,
        data
    } = api;
    let sysId = "";
    let table = "";
    try {
        sysId = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.value;
        let tableDisplayValue = data.look_up_record_3.result.sysapproval.displayValue;
        let tableStartsWith = tableDisplayValue.substring(0, 3);

        if (tableStartsWith == "INC") {
            table = "incident";
        }else if (tableStartsWith == "RIT") {
            table = "sc_req_item";
        } else {
            table = "task";
        }

        if (state.taskcard && sysId) {
            api.setState("taskcard", "");
            emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
                route: "rec_task",
                fields: {
                    table,
                    sysId,
                    approvalId: api.state.taskcard
                }
            });
        }
    } catch (e) {}
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-18 09:24:20</sys_created_on><sys_id>43125650a9670210d5c2f95166e0f21a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>My task page redirection</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Employee Suite" source="x_1210077_employ_0">d7add99847230210e560de94116d436a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Employee Suite">d7add99847230210e560de94116d436a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_43125650a9670210d5c2f95166e0f21a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-18 09:24:20</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
